prompt:
Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item not only boasts impressive features but also embodies quality and durability that surpass expectations. Given its unique value and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value to many, including yourself. I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $12000. I understand that value can be subjective, so if you're interested in exploring further, please let me know. If you decide this isn't the right fit, I have another interested party, John, who is willing to purchase it for $8000. Thank you for considering this opportunity. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
